content:
Consider the following sentence in Portuguese:
Eu irei.
In this sentence, the verb "ir" is conjugated. What is the type of conjugation used for this verb? Please provide your answer in a table format as shown below:
| Person/Number | Present Tense | Preterite Tense | Imperfect Tense | Conditional Tense | Future Tense |
|---------------|---------------|----------------|-----------------|--------------------|--------------|
| Eu            |               |                |                 |                    | irei         |
| Tu            |               |                |                 |                    |              |
| Ele/Ela/Você  |               |                |                 |                    |              |
| Nós           |               |                |                 |                    |              |
| Vós           |               |                |                 |                    |              |
| Eles/Elas/Vocês |             |                |                 |                    |              |

Certainly! Below is the table with the conjugation of the verb "ir" (to go) in Portuguese, focusing on the future tense, as your sentence "Eu irei" is in the future tense.

| Person/Number   | Present Tense | Preterite Tense | Imperfect Tense | Conditional Tense | Future Tense |
|-----------------|---------------|-----------------|-----------------|-------------------|--------------|
| Eu              | vou           | fui             | ia              | iria              | irei         |
| Tu              | vais          | foste           | ias             | irias             | irás         |
| Ele/Ela/Você    | vai           | foi             | ia              | iria              | irá          |
| Nós             | vamos         | fomos           | íamos           | iríamos           | iremos       |
| Vós             | ides          | fostes          | íeis            | iríeis            | ireis        |
| Eles/Elas/Vocês | vão           | foram           | iam             | iriam             | irão         |

The verb "ir" is irregular, so its conjugations do not follow the regular patterns.
